name: Commando Sniper
description:
Use your weapon and headshot deadly as you can. Kill all the enemies in every level. Face the most challenging battle attack in this combat. Your enemies are hiding behind the army jeep. Destroy all of them and be the best army sniper commando of this thrilling game play.

Features
Different challenge mission
Combat enemy on their place
Thrilling fight between you and enemy soldier
Good shooting experience
Stunning graphic and 3D graphic
360 degree angle
Efficient control and breathtaking sound effect
